html:
7.27.17  1:07 am   IT'S MIDNIGHT AND THERE'S LOUD WHISTLING COMING FROM OUTSIDE WHAT DO I DO

     try to whistle even louder

7.27.17  12:28 am   if each watchmen watches one watch. which watchman watches which watch?

     whichever watch they wish

7.26.17  10:30 pm   is wasting time a waste of time?

     yes

7.26.17  9:24 pm   as a surprise, you should do something completely different

     ah, that sounds like just the ticket

7.26.17  8:57 pm   if you could change one thing about the world what would it be

     the amount of things i'm allowed to change

7.26.17  8:37 pm   how many peas are in a pod?

     i dunno maybe 7

7.26.17  6:27 pm   Do you think the world will end ?

     it has been ending and starting simultaneously this whole time

7.26.17  6:07 pm   Do you talk to yourself a lot?

     only when recording it

7.26.17  5:00 pm   how to dance

      i consider everything that takes place in the universe dance

7.26.17  4:23 pm   Are you taking a break on Monday videos? Or were they only for vine (if they were)?

     they were originally for the website. ever since 2016 i've been leasning toward opening the doors to slightly longer content

7.26.17  3:34 pm   is the world meaningless?

     no

7.26.17  1:55 pm   what's something you find curious and silly about people?

     curiousity and silliness

7.26.17  1:51 pm   what are you planning to do with your youtube channel now? you've said that uploading the new songs wouldn't be the best use for the channel

     i was thinking of using that channel for videos

7.26.17  12:19 pm   Have you ever considered?

     it seems like i am doing it constantly

7.26.17  10:42 am   why is your website so bland

     the same reason plates are bland. it is so the food tastes better, compared to the plate

7.26.17  10:28 am   what makes you think "this is a great place for a key change"

     i'm not sure. after hearing enough music i guess you just know from experience.

     every time i try to write one it feels forced and not required to make the song better

     you don't need to try to make a key change. if it needs a key change, it should jump out at you, and you will know "this needs a key change!".... one thing you can think about is, where have you heard key changes? go through all the music you own and find the key changes. what are they, and when were they used? you will gradually become accustomed to the ways you like to use key changes. but don't force it

7.26.17  9:42 am   Do you consider what you are doing as art?

     i don't enjoy deciding whether things are art. by i do enjoy making it more difficult for others to decide. i'm not sure if that answers your question

7.26.17  8:45 am   did you actually drop yourself on your head when you were young?

     my mom was carrying me and i jumped, and landed on my face. i know you might blame her, but it was not her fault. i jumped

7.26.17  8:17 am   Do you plan on doing anymore 20 minute documentary videos?

     last time i did that it took almost an entire year. i would prefer to maybe try a few other different things before i'm 90

7.26.17  7:42 am   I need a surname for a fictional character. Which should I use?

     it depends on who the character is

7.26.17  7:40 am   You said "I NEED A BREAK BUT THERE IS NOTHING TO BREAK" is latest note you uploaded on that page. Will you upload more notes there?

     i upload notes all the time. will you notice?

7.26.17  7:32 am   What comes after "quadruple"? Double, triple, quadruple...is there even a word for 5x something?

     quintuple

7.26.17  5:41 am   does perfectionism hinder creative output?

     yes, often

       if so, then how might one eliminate perfectionistic thinking but still keep the bar high enough to be making good art?  how do you find the balance?

     first lower it enough so the content exists. then make adjustments from there

7.26.17  5:22 am   do you upload videos and make them public later? i see videos that i didnt see from the past and they were uploaded before i didnt see them

     the date next to items on this site is usually when the original content was made, not when it's uploaded. for certain pages that gets complicated because things were partially made at different times, but that is mostly the way it works

7.26.17  5:13 am   In your notebook, two of the entries were made on "8.*.09"
and one on "3.*.09". What does the * mean?

     it means 'i don't know'

7.26.17  1:29 am   if people asking you about capital letters saw the bottom left of this page, you think they'll freak out?

     i use both capital and lower case letters on a regular basis. and people freak out about both on a regular basis. i'm not sure if that answers your question

7.26.17  1:10 am   what's your favorite philosophy?

     changing philosophies

7.26.17  12:55 am   what is magic?

     everthing, especially you

7.26.17  12:52 am   Why is it raining 

     because it got too cloudy
7.26.17  12:39 am   What's the biggest inspiration for your style

7.25.17  9:15 pm   what is the best way to cook an egg

     with tenderness, and care

7.25.17  8:58 pm   What's impossible?

     actually reading the terms of service

7.25.17  8:43 pm   who invented music

     you

7.25.17  8:42 pm   Hypothetically if your videos were getting absolutely no views but they were still great, would you consider making them an advertisement on youtube so people could find your channel

     i've been in that exact situation before, and i chose a different strategy which is make more videos and maybe also make insane tweets to supplement the videos

7.25.17  8:42 pm   Teach me do better piano thavks 

     i am trying

7.25.17  8:17 pm   Which opinion is your favorite opinion?

      1=2

7.25.17  8:07 pm   do you like arpeggios?

     i prefer to use the notes as needed, on demand!

7.25.17  7:58 pm   Me: Can I use the bathroom?
Teacher: I don't know, CAN you?

Teachers don't realize that we can of they say he's but we can't if they say no. Because we aren't gonna go in public and we are allowed if it's an emergency. So technically saying "can I use the bathroom" would be grammatically correct? 

     the may/can line of nitpicking is obsolete anyway. 'can' can mean 'may'

7.25.17  7:52 pm   Why does pigeon fear me?

     perhaps if you are bigger

7.25.17  7:36 pm   From reading your answers it seems that you are extremely productive and constantly in the process of creating new content. Do you ever get disheartened? What drives you to give yourself such a huge work load? I mean all work and no play man how do you do it 

     someone's gotta do it
7.25.17  6:30 pm   you've probably already answered this, but y dont u use capitol letters?
7.25.17  5:26 pm   thoughts and opinions on snakes/?/

7.25.17  4:45 pm   If you had a child, what would it's name be?

     depends who they are

7.25.17  4:20 pm   What if in real life tops never stop spinning, so we are all in a lucid dream?

     why can't you dream about tops falling over

7.25.17  3:37 pm   Do you like architecture?

     oh hell yeah

7.25.17  3:05 pm   would you ever consider becoming a history teacher

     no

7.25.17  1:50 pm   how does one accidentally come to earth 

     you might not know until you are there. even then you still probably won't know

7.25.17  1:40 pm   How is symbolism like a canoe?

     the canoe symbolizes the symbolism

7.25.17  1:23 pm   What is your favorite day of the week and why?

     "today", because it holds the most possibilities, and opportunities

7.25.17  12:26 pm   How many songs have you made about getting high?

     really only 1 recorded so far, although i can think of at least 2 that have been written
